1 - sort within group by number of rows in result table 
assign a; variable v; stmt s1; procedure p1, p2; if ifs; 
Select <a, v> pattern ifs("x", _, _) such that Uses(p1, _) such that Affects*(222, s1) such that Calls*(p1, p2) such that Parent*(209, s1) pattern a(v, _) such that Modifies(p2, v) and Modifies(ifs, v) such that Uses(s1, v)        
100 a,220 a,243 a,27 a,302 a,327 a,332 a,338 a,377 a,389 a,77 a,92 a
5000
2 - sort within group by number of rows in result table (random order)
assign a; variable v; stmt s1; procedure p1, p2; if ifs; 
Select <a, v> pattern a(v, _) such that Affects*(222, s1) such that Calls*(p1, p2) and Parent*(209, s1) such that Modifies(ifs, v) and Uses(p1, _) and Uses(s1, v) and Modifies(p2, v) pattern ifs("x", _, _)
100 a,220 a,243 a,27 a,302 a,327 a,332 a,338 a,377 a,389 a,77 a,92 a
5000
3 - number of clauses in asc order (1 s1, 2 s2, 3 r3 p3 a3, 5 ifs5 v5)
stmt s1, s2, s5; if ifs2, ifs5; assign a3; while w3; variable v5; read r3; print p3;
Select <s1, ifs2, a3, s5> with s1.stmt# = 185 such that Follows(ifs2, s2) with 201 = s2.stmt# such that Follows(r3, p3) and Follows(p3, a3) such that Follows(a3, w3) pattern ifs5("a1a", _, _) and ifs5("ccc", _, _) such that Uses(ifs5, v5) with "bb2" = v5.varName such that Parent (s5, ifs5)
185 191 208 345
5000
4 - number of clauses in random order 
stmt s1, s2, s5; if ifs2, ifs5; assign a3; while w3; variable v5; read r3; print p3;
Select <s1, ifs2, a3, s5> with s1.stmt# = 185 such that Uses(ifs5, v5) with "bb2" = v5.varName such that Follows(a3, w3) pattern ifs5("a1a", _, _) such that Follows(r3, p3) such that Follows(ifs2, s2) with 201 = s2.stmt#  such that Follows(p3, a3) pattern ifs5("ccc", _, _) such that Parent (s5, ifs5)
185 191 208 345
5000
5 - number of synonyms in asc order (1 group a1 a2, 2 group s1 s2 s3 s4 s5)
assign a1, a2, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5;
Select <s1, a1> such that Follows(a1, a2) and Follows*(a1, a2) and Next(a1, a2) and Next*(a1, a2) such that Follows(s1, s2) and Follows*(s2, s3) and Next(s3, s4) and Next*(s4, s5)

6 - number of synonyms in random order 
assign a1, a2, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5;
Select <s1, a1> such that Follows(s1, s2) and Follows(a1, a2) and Follows*(s2, s3) and Next*(s4, s5) and Follows*(a1, a2) and Next(s3, s4) and Next(a1, a2) and Next*(a1, a2)

7 - Common synonym group together (1 ifs, 2 w2, 2 w1, 4v)
assign a; variable v; procedure p; if ifs; while w1, w2; 
Select BOOLEAN pattern ifs("bA", _, _) such that Next*(25, w2) and Parent*(w1, w2) pattern w1(v, _) such that Modifies(ifs, v) such that Uses(p, v) pattern a(v, _)   
TRUE
5000
8 - valid query BOOLEAN 7 clauses random order
assign a; variable v; procedure p; if ifs; while w1, w2; 
Select BOOLEAN such that Next*(25, w2) such that Modifies(ifs, v) such that Uses(p, v) pattern a(v, _) pattern w1(v, _) such that Parent*(w1, w2) pattern ifs("bA", _, _) 
TRUE
5000
